flawed_nl_solution:
40 slices per watermelon and each slice having 20 black seeds means each watermelon has 20*40=<<20*40=8000>>8000 black seeds.
40 slices per watermelon and each slice having 20 white seeds means each watermelon has 20*40=<<20*40=800>>800 white seeds.
In total, each watermelon has 8000+800=<<8000+800=8800>>8800 seeds.
#### 8800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
